sentences.sentence: The value of India decrease greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it increase greatly by 2014.
The value of India decrease greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it increase greatly by 2014; while China, America and Britain decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2014.
The sum value of India, China, America and Britain decrease greatly between 2010 and 2012, then it keep stable by 2014.

sentences.sentence: The value of India decrease greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it increase greatly by 2014.
The value of India decrease greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it increase greatly by 2014; while China, America and Britain decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2014.
The sum value of India, China, America and Britain decrease greatly between 2010 and 2012, then it keep stable by 2014.
